page.title: 08PUBLIC & COMMUNITY SERVICES
page.content: POLICE:main station outside block, substation Weston.Uniformed staff:l superintendent,2inspectors,5 sergs., 20constables;Plainclothes:1inspector, 1sergeant,3constables.Also 2traffic wardens,5communications operators,3 typists/clerks.Vehicles:1 personnel carrier,1landrover,6'police'marked,1 unmarked.5 cells.In l984 665 crimes committed,37.9% detected,380 arrests. MAGISTRATES:2courts every Tues & 2nd Thurs in month.HEALTH CARE:3GP surge- ries outside area.2private &1multiple chemists:3dentists,2opticians,1osteo- path all outside area.laccupuncturist &lhypnotist in Broad St.Physiotherapy dept sited Gloucs Rd-2physiotherapist staff treating hospital patients & outpatients.Autumn is busiest time. Visiting School doctor,dentist and a School nurse facility operating in the area regularly.
